column2:
Orders squadron to engage the enemy.
Can only be executed while on a <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>command mission<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.

Orders squadron to disengage the enemy and fall back.
Can only be executed while on a <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>command mission<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.

Orders squadron to re-engage the enemy.
Can only be executed while on a <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>command mission<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.

Orders squadron to execute a limit break on a single target. Also increases damage dealt by party members within a 20-yalm range.
Can only be executed while on a <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>command mission<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, limit gauge is at level 1, and all three squadron members are conscious.

Displays Order Hotbar.
Can only be executed while on a <UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>command mission<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
